entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't opt out of VSTestUseMSBuildOutput in project file #39127
  • Performance of `dotnet format` is very bad compared to `dotnet-format` #39124
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] Debug test failed on vscode with 9.0.100-preview.2.24128.5(runtime-9.0.0-preview.2.24127.9) installed. #39114

Closed

  • Running xunit tests from console using .NET 9 Preview 1 SDK elides important informantion #39103

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Remove the System.Drawing.Common dependency #39108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
